Certification Process - EQDS

How vendors can certify their systems as EQDS compliant

EQDS Certification

Vendors can certify their systems as EQDS Compliant.

Certification Process

Step 1: Validation

  • Validate your JSON bundles using the EQDS Validator
  • Ensure all profiles pass validation
  • Test with sample data
  • Verify conformance requirements

Step 2: Application

  • Submit test data demonstrating compliance
  • Complete certification application
  • Provide system documentation
  • Include implementation details

Step 3: Certification

  • Receive EQDS Certified badge with year
  • Get listed on the Certified Vendors page
  • Access to certification logo and materials
  • Annual renewal available (optional)
EQDS — Equine Data Standard is maintained by EQDS
